page.title: 10HOUSING : ALDERLEY EDGE ctd.
page.content: It is noticeable that land near (in) the village centre{has become scarce. Any available land,therefore,has been used to build{blocks of flats or small {compact detached houses.}To save land space,garages are built away from the houses in twos.This arrangement has only one problem,fire could easily spread. Residents in the Alderley Edge area have the best of both worlds.They are near to a{thriving village centre and {open spaces.}Part of the open space is {parkland}and part is{farmland.}(This is mainly a{green belt area).
